name: Kujira
description:
The native staking and governance token of the Kujira chain.

Kujira provides a comprehensive DeFi platform that includes tools for lending, borrowing, and yield farming, leveraging blockchain technology to offer a transparent, secure, and efficient user experience. The native token, KUJI, is central to the ecosystem, used for transaction fees, staking, and governance. Kujira's user-centric design and innovative features make it a popular choice in the DeFi space, enabling users to maximize their returns and effectively manage their digital assets.
